DOC.brief_summary: The objective study establish whether online video counsel least equally acceptable equally effective client clinician Veterans Veterans Families Counselling Service ( VVCS ) in-person counselling . If confirm evaluation online video counsel make widely available support veteran ex-service community , especially may otherwise unable attend therapy client would prefer web-based service in-person session .
DOC.criteria: Currently reside Australia Eligible receive support Veterans Veterans Families Counselling Service ( VVCS ) Aged 18 65 Home access broadband internet Own device ( e.g. , computer , laptop , tablet ) webcam support videoconferencing Be able reasonably travel VVCS centre access counsel Referred onetoone counsel therapy Be willing able receive either modality treatment ( i.e. , online inperson counselling ) .
